import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' const RecipeCard = ({ recipe }) => { console.log('this is the props ' + recipe.recipes[0].title) const ingredients = recipe.recipes[0].extendedIngredients console.log('these are the ingredients: ' + ingredients) return ( <> {JSON.stringify(recipe.recipes[0].title).replace(/\"/g, '')}

These are the ingredients

{ingredients.map((ingredient) => (
  • {ingredient.name}
))} ) } export default RecipeCard
